statements: SELECT * FROM instrument_repairs
SELECT repair_date, repair_type FROM instrument_repairs
SELECT instrument_id, repair_cost FROM instrument_repairs WHERE repair_cost > 100
SELECT * FROM instrument_repairs ORDER BY repair_date DESC
SELECT instrument_id, repair_type, repair_cost FROM instrument_repairs WHERE repair_cost < 50
SELECT * FROM instrument_repairs ORDER BY repair_date ASC, repair_cost DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT instrument_id, repair_type, repair_cost FROM instrument_repairs WHERE repair_cost > 1000 ORDER BY instrument_id
SELECT repair_date, repair_type FROM instrument_repairs WHERE repair_type LIKE 'String%'
SELECT * FROM instrument_repairs WHERE repair_cost BETWEEN 500 AND 1000
SELECT MAX(repair_cost) AS max_repair_cost, MIN(repair_cost) AS min_repair_cost FROM instrument_repairs
SELECT * FROM instrument_repair_recommendations;
SELECT instrument_id, repair_recommendation FROM instrument_repair_recommendations;
SELECT instrument_id, usage_duration FROM instrument_usage_patterns;
SELECT * FROM instrument_usage_patterns WHERE last_used_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT instrument_id, MAX(usage_duration) AS max_duration FROM instrument_usage_patterns GROUP BY instrument_id;
SELECT * FROM instrument_repair_recommendations ORDER BY instrument_id DESC;
SELECT repair_recommendation FROM instrument_repair_recommendations WHERE instrument_id = 3;
SELECT instrument_id, MAX(usage_duration) FROM instrument_usage_patterns GROUP BY instrument_id;
SELECT instrument_id, AVG(usage_duration) AS avg_duration FROM instrument_usage_patterns WHERE last_used_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' GROUP BY instrument_id HAVING avg_duration < 5;

SELECT * FROM instrument_repair_recommendations JOIN instrument_usage_patterns ON instrument_repair_recommendations.instrument_id = instrument_usage_patterns.instrument_id AND instrument_usage_patterns.last_used_date = '2022-06-15';
SELECT * FROM InstrumentUsage;
SELECT user_id, duration_minutes FROM InstrumentUsage WHERE instrument_id = 5;
SELECT instrument_id, timestamp FROM InstrumentUsage ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM RepairOptions WHERE estimated_cost > 100;
SELECT * FROM RepairRecommendation WHERE recommendation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM InstrumentUsage WHERE duration_minutes > 30 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;

SELECT recommendation_date, repair_description, estimated_cost FROM RepairOptions INNER JOIN RepairRecommendation ON RepairOptions.repair_option_id = RepairRecommendation.repair_option_id WHERE RepairRecommendation.instrument_id = 101 ORDER BY recommendation_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(duration_minutes) AS total_duration FROM InstrumentUsage GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_duration > 120;
SELECT instrument_id, MAX(timestamp) AS last_usage FROM InstrumentUsage GROUP BY instrument_id ORDER BY last_usage DESC;
SELECT * FROM RepairRecommendation WHERE recommendation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM InstrumentUsage;
SELECT instrument_name, instrument_type FROM InstrumentMaster;
SELECT repair_id, repair_date, repair_description FROM RepairHistory ORDER BY repair_date DESC;
SELECT instrument_id, usage_hours FROM InstrumentUsage WHERE usage_hours > 100;
SELECT recommended_service, recommended_date FROM RepairRecommendations WHERE instrument_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM InstrumentUsage
SELECT instrument_id, usage_hours FROM InstrumentUsage WHERE usage_hours > 100
SELECT instrument_name, instrument_type FROM InstrumentMaster
SELECT * FROM RepairHistory ORDER BY repair_date DESC
SELECT instrument_name, repair_description FROM InstrumentMaster INNER JOIN RepairHistory ON InstrumentMaster.instrument_id = RepairHistory.instrument_id
SELECT * FROM instrument_analysis;
SELECT instrument_name, usage_hours FROM instrument_analysis;
SELECT instrument_id, last_repair_date FROM instrument_analysis ORDER BY last_repair_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM instrument_repairs WHERE repair_cost > 1000;
SELECT instrument_name, repair_type, repair_date FROM instrument_repairs INNER JOIN instrument_analysis ON instrument_repairs.instrument_id = instrument_analysis.instrument_id;
SELECT * FROM instrument_analysis WHERE usage_hours > 1000;
SELECT instrument_name, usage_hours FROM instrument_analysis WHERE instrument_name LIKE 'G%';
SELECT * FROM instrument_users WHERE usage_frequency <= 5 ORDER BY user_name DESC;
SELECT instrument_id, repair_type, repair_cost FROM instrument_repairs WHERE repair_cost > 500 ORDER BY repair_cost ASC;
SELECT * FROM repair_history WHERE repair_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
